original_text: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread, and call not upon the Lord.
korean_text: 죄악을 행하는 자는 다 무지하냐 그들이 떡 먹듯이 내 백성을 먹으면서 여호와를 부르지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge?
who eat up my people as they eat bread,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 빵을 먹듯 나의 백성을 삼키며,

sentences.original_text: and call not upon the Lord.
